name: Sphere Gatherer
description:
Hello everyone !

Here's a little school project I had to wrap up for today (prototype). It's under development, so I apologies in advance for the glitches / errors it may have. But I learned A LOT of cool things while working on it, such as :

- Audio / sound
- Character controller
- Terrain
- AI (NasMesh, etc)
- Animation (rigging on
Mixamo & Unity's animator system)
- More C# x Unity stuffs for scripting
- How to make objects explode (a cube here)
- Boids again
- UI
- URP (for my spheres)

Of course I need to improve all of these, and I wish to learn how to make a state machine too and how to optimize things (such as my camera with my animations, my scripts overall, etc).

You can find the english readme inside the .zip file (it's a PDF), and I really hope you'll like it. It's not much, but it's quite cool for a third time making a game !
(⌒ω⌒)♫

If you see the name 'panda' around, it's because of the class's first project was to make a panda character in Unity xD and I named it like that when I first started working on it. I've also left some screenshots including a piece of my 'explosion' script (not whole, but you can see all my scripts and work via my GitHub here :

 https://github.com/makazemafuu/SphereGatherer ~
